monstertruckchampionship.callout:
Play solo or 8-player Online PvP

ProtonDB Gold Deck Support
monstertruckchampionship.description_text:
The first Monster Truck simulation!
From Las Vegas to Orlando, go head-to-head against experienced drivers in drag races and freestyle competitions! But before you can pull off doughnuts, wheelies and bicycles, you must first tune your truck to perfection. These machines are spectacular and impressive yet highly technical to drive. The game faithfully reproduces all the unique demands of mastering these powerful trucks, including independent front and rear wheel management, mass transfer anticipation in bends, and predicting bounces after jumps.
But what's performance without style? Customise your Monster Truck to reflect your style and show it off to your 7 opponents in online mode.
• 16 different Monster Trucks
• Over 50 customisable elements
• 25 arenas
• 3 different leagues

wrc7fiaworldrallychampionship.callout:
Local splitscreen or online play

Deck Playable
wrc7fiaworldrallychampionship.description_text:
Take on all the challenges of the 2017 World Rally Championship: the official cars and drivers, 13 countries, 52 Special Stages, every surface, more powerful cars, more demanding physics, longer races, and an eSports mode to keep you on the edge of your seat all year round. Choose among cars from prestigious manufacturers such as Hyundai, Toyota, Citroën, and Ford, perfectly recreated for a realistic driving experience. 55 official teams are available, including a large selection of WRC 2 and WRC Junior drivers. The 13 Epic Stages offer an unprecedented gaming experience with special stages that last more than 15 minutes: the ultimate endurance test for both drivers and WRC fans!

– New physics bring to life all the power of the WRC 2017 cars.
– Completely overhauled tracks provide an ultra-realistic driving experience.
– Local split screen multiplayer.
– New online challenges each week.

fiaeuropeantruckracingchampionship.description_text:
The European Truck Racing Championship is one of the most spectacular and challenging motor racing competitions.

The driving difficulty and many unique race features have been faithfully reproduced with the KT Engine (WRC).
In ETRC, like on real-life race tracks, you need to control the temperature of your brakes so they don't overheat. You must also consider the weight of the truck when cornering, monitor tyre wear and find the best tactics for overtaking.

The official FIA ETRC game is a completely new option for all fans of racing sims.
• 45 trucks with their official livery, including top manufacturers like Volvo, Man, Freightliner and Western Star
• 20 teams and the championship's best drivers
• 14 circuits including official ETRC ones, as well as Laguna Seca, Circuit of The Americas and Fuji Speedway
• 5 single-player modes and 3 multiplayer modes

truckracer.description_text:
Take control of five tons of metal and power, and floor it until you reach the finish line! Drive fully destructible trucks in Championship, Time Attack, Elimination and Quick Race. Get rid of opponents trying to block your way and make a reputation for yourself! Customize your vehicle from the engine to the paint, choose among 48 tracks and face your friends in Online or Local multiplayer for maximum destruction!

  • Drive on 10 different environments and 48 tracks
  • 6 truck categories with distinct styles, thousands of paint jobs and 54 possible upgrades!
  • 4 game modes including Championship mode with 13 events
  • 2 Multiplayer modes: Local split screen for 2 players and Online mode for up to 4 players
  • Realistic and localized damage

vrally4.description_text:
The return of a legendary off-road racing game ! Enjoy an extreme experience while becoming an expert in a demanding simulation. Take on the challenges of rallies, rallycross, drifts, buggies and hill climbs, and set off on a spectacular journey across every continent.

Dominate dangerous roads, hostile conditions and environments, constantly striving for more speed and with adrenaline boosting your reflexes. At the wheel of the most legendary off-road vehicles in each category, take on the most difficult routes in fabulous surroundings.

  • Rally: from Kenya to Sequoia Park, dominate the most difficult routes in conditions that are often extreme, at the wheel of modern and historic vehicles.
  • V-Rally Cross: intense 8-way races on dirt/tarmac tracks.
  • Extreme-Khana: drift, precision and speed, with traps scattered over the roads, putting your driving and showmanship skills to the test!
  • Buggy: become an expert at driving through hilly terrain, adopt the special reflexes and learn the particular physics needed to win these fierce races.
  • Hillclimb: reach the peaks at the wheel of these powerful, twitchy monsters.
Over 50 car models, including the most famous in rallying and extreme motor sport, for you to test drive, collect, upgrade, customise and, above all, excel at!

Developed by Kylotonn Racing Games, a studio specialising in racing simulations, V-Rally 4 has all the latest physics and graphics developments of the KT Engine.

As the trip is worth nothing unless it is shared, V-Rally 4 has a Career mode and an innovative online mode to transform your experience and progress.

Main features
  • V-Rally Mode : V-Rally's Career mode represents the heart of the experience.
  • Quick race: quickly access all the game's content (vehicles and environments), for all categories. There's nothing better for training, testing vehicles, and getting used to their particularities.
  • Multiplayer : online with up to 8 players, or offline split-screen.
  • 22 environments and Stage Generator : numerous pre-generated tracks and the ability to drive created special stages in Rally mode.
  • Vehicle customisation : in Career mode, a livery editor allows you to completely customise your vehicle and give it the colours you want!
  • More than 50 cars : Collect legendary historic (Lancia Delta S4, Porsche Carrera SC Safari, Mustang Fastback…) and modern (Ford Focus RS RX, MINI John Cooper Works, Volkswagen Polo R WRC…) cars

wrc8.callout:
Local splitscreen or online play

Deck Playable
wrc8.description_text:
The WRC championship is the most difficult and unpredictable motorsport competition in the world. Drivers, co-drivers and technical staff have to constantly adapt to get the best from their cars and be the fastest on each surface, whatever the weather, both day and night.

With the new dynamic weather system developed for WRC 8, rain, snow and hailstorms have a bigger impact, resulting in a much more true to life simulation. Road grip changes during the race, cars need to be tuned specifically for each special stage, tyre choices and stock management need to be considered, and making proper use of the weather team to get the best advice... The weather is much more than a visual effect - now it's finally coming into its own, adding a whole new dimension to the game.

In solo mode take on the new challenges of a completely overhauled, more realistic career mode, designed in conjunction with WRC drivers: schedule and activity management between rallies, research and development to improve the car, recruitment and management of your staff (mechanics, engineers, medical and weather teams, financial director, communication manager, etc.).

In multiplayer mode, weekly challenges and eSports WRC are back and the competition is more intense than ever.

With 50 teams, 14 rallies and more than 100 special stages from the 2019 season, WRC 8 offers the most content ever in an off-road racing game. Rise to the challenge!

ablegamers.description_text:
Donations to support AbleGamers are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Since 2004, AbleGamers charity has been assisting more than 70 million gamers with disabilities in the gaming community as a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization that grants assistive technology to children, adults, and veterans with disabilities, enabling a greater quality of life utilizing the power of video games. AbleGamers also provides free consultation to developers on how to make every game as accessible as possible. In addition, AbleGamers Laboratories brings people of all ages with a variety of disabilities into safe places all around the United States and Canada to allow hands-on demonstrations with cutting-edge technology. AbleGamers Charity - So Everyone Can Game.

ttisleofman_rideontheedge.human_name: TT Isle of Man: Ride on the Edge
ttisleofman_rideontheedge.description_text:
For bikers, there are two types of speed races: the Isle of Man TT and the rest. No other race is as gruelling for the motorbikes and demanding for the riders. Take up the challenge of the Snaefell Mountain course: all 37.73 miles faithfully reproduced with the champions and their bikes.
110 years of history have made TT a motor racing legend. Memorise each section of the course, round each bend to perfection, keep your concentration throughout the 6 laps, get the best time and write your name alongside the greatest champions.

• THE SNAEFELL MOUNTAIN COURSE FAITHFULLY REPRODUCED: 37.73 miles of roads and 264 bends for a race that is longer and more difficult than all GP circuits together.
• THE OFFICIAL RIDERS AND THEIR ULTRA-POWERFUL MOTORBIKES: 25 riders and 38 motorbikes hurtling along mountain roads at over 180 mph.
• REALISTIC RIDING APPROVED BY TT RIDERS: lifelike motorbike behaviour to experience the real sensations of riding, just like on the actual course.
• ONLINE COMPETITION FOR UP TO 8 PLAYERS.

ttisleofmanrideontheedge2.human_name: TT Isle of Man: Ride on the Edge 2
ttisleofmanrideontheedge2.callout:
Play solo or Online PvP

ProtonDB Gold Deck Support
ttisleofmanrideontheedge2.description_text:
Without a shadow of a doubt it is one of the most dangerous motorbike races in the world. In TT Isle of Man – Ride On the Edge 2, you prove your worth in different championships before setting out to conquer the Snaefell Mountain Course, a 60 km-long track with both winding and straight sections that will push your riding skills to the limit.

TT 2 features 17 additional tracks, 18 different motorbikes including classic models, and the official riders. And now it’s more realistic than ever, thanks to entirely revamped physics and faithfully reproduced rider movements.

Fine-tune your motorbike, upgrade its performance and monitor its data in real time so you can stay competitive.

TT 2 also offers a brand-new open world, a biker's paradise where you can test your bike settings and gain the experience you'll need to win the TT Isle of Man title!

ttisleofman_rideontheedge3.human_name: TT Isle of Man: Ride on the Edge 3
ttisleofman_rideontheedge3.callout:
Play solo or Online PvP

Deck Playable
ttisleofman_rideontheedge3.description_text:
The Isle of Man Tourist Trophy is the most epic, most dangerous and most spectacular race in the world. It is a course of over 60 kms on the roads of the Isle of Man, includes 264 bends, and requires high-powered bikes specially prepared for the race. The riders who compete in it train their whole lives for the chance to win the ultimate accolade: being crowned champion of the Isle of Man TT.

The game includes all the official content of the latest TT (riders, bikes, teams, course) for a unique and true-to-life experience. You are plunged into the middle of the TT as if you were there. And you will feel all the passion and tension this race generates.

Whether you compete in the Supersport or Superbike class, you can ride on 32 different circuits and over 200 kms of roads. Simply choose one of the 38 official riders available: 21 in Superbike and 17 in Supersport.

The game features easy-to-learn and intuitive riding with ultra-realistic and cutting-edge physics for the ultimate immersion and simulation quality. Many professional riders even use the game to train and learn the circuit.

The major new feature in this edition is an open world that can be used to freely ride around the roads of the Isle of Man to find different game modes and a wide range of challenges:
- Quick Race
- Career Mode
- Online Multiplayer
- Weekly and monthly races

wrcgenerationsthefiawrcofficialgame.human_name: WRC Generations - The FIA WRC Official Game
wrcgenerationsthefiawrcofficialgame.callout:
Local splitscreen or online play

ProtonDB Silver Deck Support
wrcgenerationsthefiawrcofficialgame.description_text:
2022 will see the WRC transition to the hybrid era. This is a revolution for the rally world, significantly affecting performance, changing strategies and making drivers and teams adapt.

In terms of gameplay, new mechanics have been integrated to represent the demands of the hybrid engines. In order to win, you have to carefully manage your battery by adapting your engine mapping throughout the special stages you take part in.

As community satisfaction is always a priority , you can now share customised livery and stickers with other players. The best creations will be rewarded and highlighted.

For fans of competition, the new Leagues mode lets players challenge opponents with a similar level online. Finish ahead of your competitors to move up the ladder in the Legends category.

WRC Generations includes more content than ever before in a rally game.
  • 750 km of unique special stages in 22 countries
  • 49 teams from the 2022 season (Rally1 / Rally2 / Junior WRC)
  • 37 legendary cars plus additional bonuses
  • 165 timed special stages

In order to make the representation of the championship even more realistic, a completely redesigned Rally Sweden environment has been added, with 6 brand-new special stages in the Umea region.

New features:
  • The new hybrid vehicles
  • New, even more realistic vehicle physics
  • A LEAGUES mode in which you can challenge other players
  • A new Rally Sweden environment with 6 brand-new special stages
  • Share livery and stickers with the community
  • In-game team creation and management

coupontestdriveunlimitedsolarcrown35off.human_name: COUPON 35% OFF Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown
coupontestdriveunlimitedsolarcrown35off.description_text:
Get 35% off Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown in the Humble Store!

NOTE: Expires February 5th, 2025, 6pm PST. Does not stack with Humble Store sales.

(RE-)EXPERIENCE TEST DRIVE UNLIMITED

13 years after the release of Test Drive Unlimited 2, TDUSC reinvents the open-world massively multiplayer racing game genre. Express your passion for cars via innovative gameplay and meticulous attention to detail. Test drive then purchase cars directly from dealerships, customize them in workshops, and display them in the garage of your Solar Hotel suite. Each car offers a unique driving experience and complete immersion (windows, sunroofs, engines, etc.) and it's this exclusive experience that dictates which car you want to choose on any given day.

EXPLORE HONG KONG ISLAND

Drive around a map that has never featured in a racing game before: Hong Kong Island. Fully recreated at 1:1 scale, it is brimming with unique locations to explore. From old narrow streets and major highways to mountain roads and beaches: every cruise will be different from the last. Alone or with friends, set off and search for hundreds of collectible items that offer a variety of rewards.

COMPLETE YOUR COLLECTION

Acquire iconic models from all the famous manufacturers: Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche, Bugatti, Koenigsegg, Aston Martin and many more. In total, over 30 car manufacturers are represented with a variety of car types, from 1960s daily drivers to ultra-modern hypercars to off-road vehicles. MEET OTHER ENTHUSIASTS Create an avatar to represent you and meet other car enthusiasts in the streets of Hong Kong or in one of the many social hubs: the Solar Hotel, car dealerships, workshops, clan HQs… These places are ideal for meeting people and sharing your passion for cars together.

CHOOSE YOUR CLAN

Take part in the clan wars by joining one of the two families fighting for supremacy: the Streets, the flamboyant provocateurs; or the Sharps, who prefer understated sophistication. Go head-to-head with the challengers of each clan in thrilling races to climb the ranks and earn unique rewards.

BECOME ONE OF THE ELITE

Dominate your opponents in a ranked mode designed for competitive racing. From Bronze rank to Solar King/Queen, your progress will be equal parts challenging and satisfying with a range of exclusive rewards available for those looking for PvP battles.

overpass2.description_text:
The only simulation that blends racing and obstacles is back with new content and game modes.

Put your skills to the test in 5 game modes in which you have to come to grips with demanding challenges: off-road sprint, off-road circuit, hill climb, obstacle course, closed circuit.

Your results will depend on how well you can analyse the course and pick the best routes. At the controls of powerful buggies and quads from major manufacturers such as Yamaha, Arctic Cat and Suzuki, you will travel across 30 routes in 5 regions: Baja Desert, East Central US, Johnson Valley, Utah Desert and Western Europe.

Rise to the challenge of the ultra-comprehensive career mode! Manage your team, sponsors and budget while making the right research and development choices so you can upgrade your vehicles to meet your objectives, all while mapping out your team's progress using the skill tree.

Rocks, tree trunks, mud and many more natural and artificial obstacles will slow you down during the various races and could damage your vehicle.

Find the best way to get around them and reach the finish line at the controls of over 30 official vehicles, each with its own specific technical characteristics. The biggest manufacturers are represented: Polaris, Yamaha, Arctic Cat, Kawasaki and Suzuki, including, for the driver's equipment, Alpinestars, Arai, Sparco, Stilo, Stand 21 and many more.

Take advantage of a wide range of settings to adapt your vehicle to the terrain and improve the performance. It's up to you to manage the power, motor functions and transmission so you can be as fast as possible according to the conditions (terrain, surface, type of race, etc.).

To be even more competitive, bear in mind that precision and regularity are better than pure speed. This is the challenge that awaits you in OVERPASS 2.

  • 30 vehicles from official manufacturers, in 3 categories: UTV, ATV, Rock Bouncer
  • 5 types of races: off-road sprint, off-road circuit, hill climb, obstacle course, closed circuit
  • Official manufacturers, equipment and sponsors
  • 4 types of environments: desert, forest, mountain, circuits
  • A comprehensive career mode with team and calendar management
  • Advanced vehicle and driver customisation
  • Online races for up to 8 players.

basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Discover some of comics’ most indelible characters in the universe of Eisner Award–winning artist & writer Terry Moore! Get caught up in the lives of Katchoo, Francine, and David in the complete run of the groundbreaking series Strangers in Paradise. Meet Julie, whose life changes forever when liquid metal rains from the sky in Echo. Unravel the mystery of a woman who wakes up in her own grave in Rachel Rising. Plus, your purchase helps support The Hero Initiative!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Tales of love, murder, and hi-tech battle suits
basic_data.description:
Tales of love, murder, and hi-tech battle suits. Discover some of comics’ most indelible characters in the universe of Eisner Award–winning artist & writer Terry Moore! Get caught up in the lives of Katchoo, Francine, and David in the complete run of the groundbreaking series Strangers in Paradise. Meet Julie, whose life changes forever when liquid metal rains from the sky in Echo. Unravel the mystery of a woman who wakes up in her own grave in Rachel Rising. sipkids.description_text: The characters of Strangers In Paradise return as 8 year olds in this G-Rated collection of stories for every season. Katchoo, Francine, Freddie.. they’re all here as kids playing soccer, crashing birthday parties, skiing and trick-or-treating. This one is for the kid in all of us.

rachelrisingv4_wintergraves.description_text: Rachel search for the person who murdered her is aided by Zoe, a 10 year old serial killer fighting her own demons.

rachelrisingv6_secretskept.description_text: The body count rises in Manson as Lilith reconnects with Rachel and reveals a wicked undercurrent.

strangersinparadisev15_tomorrownow.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V15: Tomorrow Now
strangersinparadisev15_tomorrownow.description_text: Francine got everything she wanted except Katchoo. Is it enough? Meanwhile Katchoo builds a new life with her art.

strangersinparadisev8_myotherlife.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V8: My Other Life
strangersinparadisev8_myotherlife.description_text: A terrifying plane crash forces Katchoo to accept an offer she cannot refuse.

rachelrisingv7_dusttodust.human_name: Rachel Rising V7: Dust to Dust
rachelrisingv7_dusttodust.description_text: Rachel and Jet should be dead, so why are they still here looking gorgeous? Zoe suggests the answer is Lilith.

echov1_moonlake.description_text: An explosion in the sky rains down liquid metal on Julie that begins to form an armor. When the military comes to retrieve it, the armor strikes back and forces Julie to run for her life.

fiveyearsv2_stalemate.description_text: Katchoo’s trip to Russia falls short of expectations when she encounters a dangerous assassin. Meanwhile Stephanie recovers half of the ancient scroll only to discover the author wants it back! Can anyone stop the clock and bring the nuclear game to a stalemate?!

motorgirlv2_nomanleftbehind.human_name: Motor Girl V2: No Man Left Behind
motorgirlv2_nomanleftbehind.description_text: Sam’s wartime experience haunts her as she fights to keep a grip on reality while saving the little E.T. BiK. Aunt Libby knows Sam needs a life saving operation ASAP but getting the vet to cooperate proves impossible until she finishes one last mission.

strangersinparadisev11_bravenewworld.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V11: Brave New World
strangersinparadisev11_bravenewworld.description_text: Katchoo and Francine finally talk openly about their relationship. Meanwhile David returns to Japan with Tambi on his trail.

strangersinparadisev2_idreamofyou.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V2: I Dream of You
strangersinparadisev2_idreamofyou.description_text: Katchoo’s wicked past tracks her down and threatens to destroy her new life with Francine. Meet Darcy Parker.

fiveyearsv1_fireinthesky.human_name: Five Years V1: Fire in the Sky
fiveyearsv1_fireinthesky.description_text: The Terryverse comes together to stop the rise of an apocalyptic device hailed as The Last Bomb. With a collider test scheduled in 5 years, Tambi recruits Katchoo, Rachel and Zoe to help track down the scientists involved.

rachelrisingv5_nightcometh.description_text: Rachel and Jet attempt to stop the mother of all witches from destroying their town while Zoe negotiates a deal with the demon Malus.

ever_thewayout.description_text: Everly is a street smart 17 year old when she meets the angel Timothy, who claims she will fulfill an ancient prophecy on her 18th birthday. When Ever finds out this means sacrificing herself to the Pit Of Darkness, she refuses. Enter Samuel, a mysterious angel who changes Ever’s life forever.

strangersinparadisev17_tattoo.description_text: Katchoo and David visit Casey in Las Vegas while Francine is haunted by the one she left behind.

strangersinparadisev7_sanctuary.description_text: Serious differences separate Katchoo and Francine while Casey proves to be an unstoppable force of friendship.

echov4_collider.description_text: Julie learns the volatile alloy she wears is meant for a much larger project, one she now knows will destroy everything.

strangersinparadisev3_itsagoodlife.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V3: It's a Good Life
strangersinparadisev3_itsagoodlife.description_text: Davis has some explaining to do while Freddie’s rebound girlfriend makes a splash. Meet Casey.

echov3_desertrun.description_text: A madman chases Julie across the desert as she and Dillon begin to learn what her body armor really is.

theheroinitiative.description_text:
Donations to support The Hero Initiative are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The Hero Initiative is the first-ever federally chartered not-for-profit corporation dedicated strictly to helping comic book artists and craftsmen in need. Hero Initiative creates a financial safety net for yesterday's creators who may need emergency medical aid, financial support for essentials of life, and an avenue back into paying work. It's a chance for all of us to give back something to the people who have given us so much enjoyment.

Since its inception, The Hero Initiative has had the good fortune to grant over $700,000 to the comics veterans who have paved the way for those in the industry today.

strangersinparadisev14_davidsstory.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V14: David's Story
strangersinparadisev14_davidsstory.description_text: Born into a powerful crime family, David and sister Darcy forge two very paths, one leads to power, the other to love.

echov2_atomicdreams.description_text: Julie is leaving a trail of bodies in her wake with NSB agent Ivy hot tracking her every clue. Is Julie responsible for the gruesome deaths or is there another person with the hi-tech armor?

strangersinparadisexxvv2_hideandseek.human_name: Strangers in Paradise XXV V2: Hide and Seek
strangersinparadisexxvv2_hideandseek.description_text: Katchoo’s search for Stephanie uncovers rogue Parker Girl’s connection to a much larger threat, the bomb to end all bombs, made possible by an ancient scroll written by Lilith in 4,000 B.C.!

strangersinparadisexxvv1_thechase.human_name: Strangers in Paradise XXV V1: The Chase
strangersinparadisexxvv1_thechase.description_text: When Stephanie, one of Darcy Parker’s spies, is caught in Washington D.C. she agrees to tell a senate committee everything, then disappears. Tambi convinces Katchoo to join the global search for Stephanie and stop her at all costs.

serialv1_theglasstomb.description_text: Zoe has been 10 years old for 50 years, thanks to a demon who possessed her and turned her into a serial killer. When a childhood friend is murdered, Zoe is determined to find the killer before the police in order to revenge her friend.

rachelrisingv3_cemeterysongs.description_text: Lilith reveals her true identity to Rachel who has secrets of her own.

strangersinparadisev19_everafter.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V19: Ever After
strangersinparadisev19_everafter.description_text: Faced with losing David, Katchoo comes up with a shocking plan of action. Francine comes back to Katchoo but is she too late?

echov6_thelastday.description_text: Julie and friends do everything possible to stop a military attempt to create a black hole in their super-collider.

serialv2_catandmouse.description_text: Zoe stays one step ahead of the police, using all her expertise to track down the clever serial killer named Jenni. But finding Jenni is one thing, stopping her is another!

terrymoores2021sketchbook.description_text: 108 pages of beautiful sketches and portraits of Moore’s characters from his most popular titles.

strangersinparadisev1_thecollectedstrang.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V1: The Collected Strangers In Paradise
strangersinparadisev1_thecollectedstrang.description_text: David loves Katchoo but Katchoo loves Francine but Francine loves Freddie. Get ready to rumble!

rachelrisingv2_fearnomalus.human_name: Rachel Rising V2: Fear No Malus
rachelrisingv2_fearnomalus.description_text: Rachel and Lilith join forces to fight Zoe’s demon, Malus. Rachel finally is able to confront her own killer.

strangersinparadisev4_lovemetender.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V4: Love Me Tender
strangersinparadisev4_lovemetender.description_text: Katchoo and Francine’s rocky relationship heats up, despite a new threat, Veronica.

strangersinparadisev5_immortalenemies.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V5: Immortal Enemies
strangersinparadisev5_immortalenemies.description_text: Katchoo returns to Darcy to finish what she started while Francine learns the truth about Katchoo’s past.

rachelrisingv1_theshadowofdeath.human_name: Rachel Rising V1: The Shadow of Death
rachelrisingv1_theshadowofdeath.description_text: Rachel wakes up in a grave in the woods outside small town Manson. Her search for answers uncovers a creepy town where everyone is a suspect.

strangersinparadisev18_loveandlies.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V18: Love and Lies
strangersinparadisev18_loveandlies.description_text: When David’s health becomes a serious issue, he and Casey devise a plan to reunite Francine and Katchoo.

strangersinparadisev6_highschool.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V6: High School
strangersinparadisev6_highschool.description_text: Francine and Katchoo meet and form a lifelong bond in high school. Bonus short story: Princess Warrior!

motorgirlv1_reallife.description_text: A UFO crashes into the junkyard, of war vet Samantha. With her imaginary friend Mike by her side, Sam repairs the ship but now E.T. “BiK” has a crush on her. Not sure what is or isn’t real, Sam struggles with PTSD to fend off a contractor determined to blast Its out of the sky.

strangersinparadisev12_heartinhand.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V12: Heart In Hand
strangersinparadisev12_heartinhand.description_text: The bond between Francine and Katchoo prepares to go to a new level as an ex-Parker Girl targets Katchoo.

25thanniversarysketchbook.description_text: Over the years Moore has produced a vast amount of sketches and designs, most of which feature the strong female character from his books. This beautiful collection offers and inside look at the artist and his work.

terrymooreshowtodrawexpandedversion.human_name: Terry Moore's How to Draw Expanded Version
terrymooreshowtodrawexpandedversion.description_text: The secrets of drawing the female form, expressions, beauty, funny, body language and comic timing are all just a few of the subjects discussed in Moore’s book, drawing on 25 years of experience in the comic book business. A must have for anyone aspiring to master the art of comic storytelling.

strangersinparadisev10_tropicofdesire.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V10: Tropic of Desire
strangersinparadisev10_tropicofdesire.description_text: David secretly struggles with his health while Francine begins to see life with Katchoo in a new light.

echov5_blackhole.description_text: Julie and Ivy work together to track down a secret military super-collider.

strangersinparadisev9_childofrage.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V9: Child of Rage
strangersinparadisev9_childofrage.description_text: Katchoo and Tambi attempt to bring down the Big Six cartel while Veronica lays a trap using Francine as bait.

strangersinparadisev16_mollyandpoo.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V16: Molly & Poo
strangersinparadisev16_mollyandpoo.description_text: Molly finds it difficult to separate fiction from reality as she writes a wicked new version of Jack The Ripper.

strangersinparadisev13_flowertoflame.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V13: Flower To Flame
strangersinparadisev13_flowertoflame.description_text: Katchoo fights to save her relationship with Francine while Tambi saves them all from a lethal plot of revenge.

theheroinitiative.description_text:
Donations to support The Hero Initiative are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The Hero Initiative is the first-ever federally chartered not-for-profit corporation dedicated strictly to helping comic book artists and craftsmen in need. Hero Initiative creates a financial safety net for yesterday's creators who may need emergency medical aid, financial support for essentials of life, and an avenue back into paying work. It's a chance for all of us to give back something to the people who have given us so much enjoyment.

Since its inception, The Hero Initiative has had the good fortune to grant over $700,000 to the comics veterans who have paved the way for those in the industry today.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: The Ultimate Terry Moore Collection by Abstract Studios Encore
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: Tales of love, murder, and hi-tech battle suits
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Echo V1: Moon Lake, Terry Moore's 2021 Sketchbook, Rachel Rising V1: The Shadow of Death, Terry Moore's How to Draw Expanded Version, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Discover some of comics’ most indelible characters in the universe of Eisner Award–winning artist & writer Terry Moore! Get caught up in the lives of Katchoo, Francine, and David in the complete run of the groundbreaking series Strangers in Paradise. Meet Julie, whose life changes forever when liquid metal rains from the sky in Echo. Unravel the mystery of a woman who wakes up in her own grave in Rachel Rising. Plus, your purchase helps support The Hero Initiative!
from_bundle.author: Abstract Studios

basic_data.human_name: Humble Software Bundle: Make Your Own Games In Unreal Engine 5 from GameDev.tv
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Are you curious about turning your passion for gaming into a career in game development? Our latest bundle with GameDev.tv will help teach you how to use Unreal Engine 5 and get you started on an exciting new adventure. Master the universally beloved game engine with our comprehensive bundle composed of industry-leading courses like Unreal Engine 5 C++: Make Your Own Action Combat Game, Unreal Engine 5 Blueprints: First Person Shooter, and more! Start creating and help support Direct Relief with your purchase.
basic_data.description:
From gamer to game developer. Are you curious about turning your passion for gaming into a career in game development? Our latest bundle with GameDev.tv will help teach you how to use Unreal Engine 5 and get you started on an exciting new adventure. Master the universally beloved game engine with our comprehensive bundle composed of industry-leading courses like Unreal Engine 5 C++: Make Your Own Action Combat Game, Unreal Engine 5 Blueprints: First Person Shooter, and more! Start creating and help support Direct Relief with your purchase.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $2,130. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. Keys for this bundle are redeemable on the GameDev.TV website.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Direct Relief. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

GameDev.tv have spent the last decade working with world class instructors to create the perfect learning experience for game development. Join our global community of over 2 million students and start making your own games today!

unreal50cplusplusdevelopercourse.description_text:
Ready to make games in the amazing world of Unreal Engine 5?

This ""critically-acclaimed"" and ""insanely successful"" Unreal Engine course was created in collaboration with Epic Games.

We start super simple so no prior experience of Unreal or coding is needed! We believe project-based learning is the best way to learn Unreal Engine, so you’ll create 5 Unreal games (including a tank game and FPS)!

You’ll learn C++, the powerful industry-standard language from scratch. And by the end of the course, you'll be confident in the basics of coding and game development (and hungry to learn more - which is handy because there’s a ton more in this bundle!).

""Any serious game programmer needs to know C++"" Jason Gregory, Lead Programmer at Naughty Dog (creators of Uncharted & The Last of Us)

Benefit from our world-class support from both other students, and the instructors who are on the forums regularly.

Grab the bundle and start making UE5 games now!

unrealenginecinematiccreatorcourse.description_text:
Make your own cinematic moments (cut-scenes and gameplay moments) using Unreal Engine 4's Sequencer Tool.

Sequencer (which is included with the Unreal Editor - no additional download necessary) is a powerful editor which allows you to add tracks and animate everything from your cameras to your characters to your world.

In this course you’ll learn how to:

+ Create your own non-interactive cut-scene which is triggered from gameplay. + Compose interesting camera shots and animate your cameras as if you were Steven Spielberg's personal camera operator. + Create movement and flavor in your levels by animating world events to take place as the player moves through your level (explosions and landslides anyone?). + Create simple gameplay systems such as allowing the player to open doors when they run near them. + Create animation sequences and render them to movie format so that you can make your own short films!

fpsmusicassetpack.description_text:
Listen to the sounds of FPS action with 15 tracks of epic rhythm. Whether you're taking an arrow to the knee, or trying to save humanity from an alien invasion, this pack has everything you need musically to create an FPS or action game set in a far away land.

Includes both MP3 files and high quality WAV files!

This pack was designed by composer Jorge Velasco, and includes a wide range of compositions for varying emotions and landscapes!

unrealengine5_buildacompletesurvivalgame.human_name: Unreal Engine 5: Build a Complete Survival Game with Blueprint Course
unrealengine5_buildacompletesurvivalgame.description_text:
Ever dreamt of crafting your own survival game?

With this Unreal Engine 5 course, you’ll build a full-fledged survival adventure from scratch—tropical island, grid inventory, and enemy AI included!

Learn to master modular systems for crafting, building, and looting, all while optimising Blueprints for smooth gameplay.

Chop trees, battle foes, and design a stunning island paradise, step by step.

Whether you’re stuck on mechanics or new to modular coding, we’ve got you covered.

No half-finished projects here—just a polished survival game you’ll be proud of. Ready to conquer the wild? Nab this bundle and let’s dive in!

unrealengine2d_makeyourownepic2dgamesusi.human_name: Unreal Engine 2D: Make Your Own Epic 2D Games Using C++ Course
unrealengine2d_makeyourownepic2dgamesusi.description_text:
Start your 2D game dev journey with Unreal Engine and C++ in style!

This course takes you from sprites to full-on gameplay, teaching you how to craft platformers, shooters, and racers like a pro.

Get hands-on with Unreal’s 2D tools, including Paper2D and PaperZD, while building three rad games—Desert Racer, Gun Survivors, and Crusty Pirate.

Learn to design levels, code smooth gameplay, and create engaging mechanics with obstacles, enemies, and loot.

Whether you’re new to Unreal or switching from another engine, this is your guide to building 2D games that shine. Let’s make something awesome!

unrealengine5environmentdesigncourse.description_text:
Want to get up and running quickly in Unreal Engine 5? Fancy checking out how to make best use of the new technologies, Nanite and Lumen?

Perhaps you want to easily make your game level look AAA quality, or you’re wondering how to design aesthetically pleasing environments?

Then you’re in the right place!

You’ll learn how to use Unreal Engine 5 to make AAA looking natural environments. Using its new features, Nanite and Lumen, you’ll make beautiful looking levels. We’ll show you how to import free assets from Quixel Megascan and hand place them in your environment, adjusting the look of individual assets so they blend with other assets in your level.

You’ll create an interesting level layout which guides the player through your level. We’ll show you how to use the landscape and foliage tools to quickly bring your level to life and how to adjust lighting and post-processing, to get the best looking level possible.

So if you’re interested in making great looking levels in Unreal Engine or you fancy diving into Unreal 5’s new feature. This is the course for you.

unreal5_masterenhancedinputwithcplusplus.human_name: Unreal 5: Master Enhanced Input with C++ & Blueprints Course
unreal5_masterenhancedinputwithcplusplus.description_text:
Ready to unlock your game dev superpowers? Our Unreal Enhanced Input course is here to help you ditch the old system and master the shiny new one. You’ll set up custom input mappings, bind actions like a legend (C++ or Blueprint—your call), and finally understand those “what even are these” topics like value types, trigger states, and input modifiers.

By the end, you’ll be designing characters that move, rotate, and interact with controls smoother than your favourite speedrun.

No fluff, no jargon, just clear, practical lessons that make learning fun.

Grab the bundle now and let’s level up!

cplusplusfundamentalscourse.description_text:
Learning to program can be dull, and learning C++ is hard enough without having to learn a game engine as well.

In this course you’ll learn coding the fun way, by making games!

You'll start by compiling your first program in C++, using Visual Studio Code as your text editor. Then create your first axe dodging game using the Raylib library. This project introduces the basic concepts of programming: variables, loops and if-statements.

You expand on this in Dapper Dasher, by building a side-scrolling running game. In addition to covering essential programming concepts such as structs and functions, you'll learn to animate 2D characters and make your game pretty.

In Classy Clash we introduce Object Oriented Programming. You'll learn how this simplifies programming for games and how inheritance can avoid code duplication.

Whether you're a total beginner to programming and want to learn pure C++, or an intermediate Unreal student who wants to explore making games in pure C++, this is the course for you!

unrealengine5cplusplus_makeyourownaction.human_name: Unreal Engine 5 C++: Make Your Own Action Combat Game Course
unrealengine5cplusplus_makeyourownaction.description_text:
Ready to craft third-person melee combat that feels straight out of a AAA brawler?

This Unreal Engine 5 course takes your C++ skills to the next level with action-packed systems, dynamic animations, and fierce enemy AI.

Lock onto targets with ease, cycle through slick attack combos, and build scalable stat systems that grow with your game.

You’ll write over a thousand lines of clean, efficient code, mastering interfaces, design patterns, and debugging like a pro.

By the end, you’ll have a polished combat game and the skills to tackle any Unreal project. Let’s make something epic (pun intended) —get the bundle and jump in now!

unrealengine5blueprintsfirstpersonshoote.human_name: Unreal Engine 5 Blueprints First Person Shooter (FPS) Course
unrealengine5blueprintsfirstpersonshoote.description_text:
Ready to create a game in the amazing world of Unreal Engine 5?

Make an awesome first person shooter game, where players will be spawned into a level with a handful of dangerous drones and tasked with destroying them to clear the zone!

Your game will have it all! You’ll create a first person shooter character, with movement mechanics and animation. Attach weapons and combat with effects including sounds and particle systems.

Then you get to create hostile enemy drones with pathfinding. Finally adding Game Mode and HUD with countdown timers, health bars, announcements, game states and score. Oh and it wouldn’t be a FPS game without health and ammo pickups, so you’ll learn that too!

This course is ideal if you want to make your own video games in UE5, are a beginner with no game development experience or if you have experience in other engines such as Unity.

So pick up the bundle and dive into the amazing world of UE5 now!

unrealengineblueprintgamedevelopercourse.human_name: Unreal Engine Blueprint Game Developer Course
unrealengineblueprintgamedevelopercourse.description_text:
Learn how to code your first video game in under 2 hours, with Visual Scripting. Created in collaboration with Epic Games.

This is the partner course to the Complete Unreal C++ Developer, one of the most popular Unreal courses on the web.

You’ll learn how to make games without writing traditional code by using Unreal Engine 4 and its powerful visual coding system, Blueprints. We’ll start at a beginners pace, so no prior experience or knowledge of Unreal Engine 4 or game development is needed.

By the end of just the first section, you’ll have gone from not even having Unreal installed to making your first game: Marble Run! In fact, once you become more confident you’ll be able to make the Marble Run game in less than 15 minutes! That's how easy and powerful Unreal Blueprint can be.

So what are you waiting for?

directrelief.description_text:
Donations to support Direct Relief are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Founded in 1948, Direct Relief is a nonprofit, nonpartisan organization that has become one the world’s largest providers of medical relief in the world. Direct Relief works with healthcare professionals and organizations on the ground, establishing partnerships with local organizations that provide health services to people who would otherwise not receive them. Active in all 50 states and in 70 countries, Direct Relief is the only U.S. nonprofit organization licensed and accredited to distribute prescription medications in all 50 U.S. states.  Among its distinctions, Direct Relief has top charity ratings, including four-star and "top-notch" ratings from Charity Navigator, a 100% fundraising efficiency rating from Forbes magazine, and was recently recognized by Fast Company as one of the Top 10 Most Innovative Nonprofits in the World.

Direct Relief’s ongoing partnerships allow it to respond fast and expansively in times of emergency, including the devastating earthquakes in Nepal, where it has provided over $28 million (wholesale value) in medical aid to date.  This includes supplies for surgeries and treatment of trauma-related injuries, antibiotics, nutritional items, and other critical medical resources.

unrealengine5cplusplusmultiplayer_makeyo.human_name: Unreal Engine 5 C++ Multiplayer: Make Your Own Co-Op Game
unrealengine5cplusplusmultiplayer_makeyo.description_text:
Want to learn how to make your own online multiplayer adventure games?

Create a two player co-op action adventure game, while learning the code and principles needed to make whatever type of online multiplayer game you want to make!

Along with learning all about level design, you’ll also create different gameplay features like pressure plates, movable platforms and doors, and collectible keys.

By the end of the course you’ll have a fun co-op adventure game you can play with your friend online. Plus the tools to continue to work on it and really make it your own!

This is an intermediate course, so if you already know a bit of Unreal that’s ideal and if not, simply take one of the other Unreal courses in this bundle first - the Unreal 5 C++ Developer is a great starting point!

unrealmaterialpack1.description_text:
Make your game POP with this Materials Pack for Unreal! Stone, metal, gravel, rust, wood and so many more textures! This pack includes dozens of materials directly usable in Unreal Engine 5.1 to make your games look AMAZING! And with the included .Unreal scene file, you can get right into the action.

This material asset pack pack features:

24 master materials with some variations 50 material instances A preview map 1 Unreal Engine file with all the materials in them And you'll get the most out of it because:

This pack is built for use in your own projects You can use these materials to make your games look better All materials are fully configurable in Unreal Engine 5.1 All materials work for any mesh All materials are specially designed to be loopable and tileable This pack is perfect for any type of Unreal Engine game!

unrealengine5_actionadventuregamedevelop.human_name: Unreal Engine 5: Action Adventure Game Development Course
unrealengine5_actionadventuregamedevelop.description_text:
Want to make that 3rd person action adventure game you’ve always dreamt of?

All using the latest tools in Unreal 5.1, including MetaHumans, Quixel Bridge, Nanite and Lumen?

Your game will have it all! We'll teach you how to use raycasting to shoot weapons and deal damage to enemies, how to trigger events, move objects, create hazards and other important action adventure mechanics.

By the end of the course you’ll have your own playable level, complete with hazards, obstacles, pickups and interactables.

This course is ideal if you want to make a cool looking game or simply get better with Unreal and Blueprints.

directrelief.description_text:
Donations to support Direct Relief are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Founded in 1948, Direct Relief is a nonprofit, nonpartisan organization that has become one the world’s largest providers of medical relief in the world. Direct Relief works with healthcare professionals and organizations on the ground, establishing partnerships with local organizations that provide health services to people who would otherwise not receive them. Active in all 50 states and in 70 countries, Direct Relief is the only U.S. nonprofit organization licensed and accredited to distribute prescription medications in all 50 U.S. states.  Among its distinctions, Direct Relief has top charity ratings, including four-star and "top-notch" ratings from Charity Navigator, a 100% fundraising efficiency rating from Forbes magazine, and was recently recognized by Fast Company as one of the Top 10 Most Innovative Nonprofits in the World.
